channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Slider, Gallery, and Carousel by MetaSlider
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Slider, Gallery, and Carousel by MetaSlider

item.title: CVE-2023-1473|2024-08-02T05:49:11.438Z -- unknown -- slider%2C%20gallery%2C%20and%20carousel%20by%20metaslider
item.description: The Slider, Gallery, and Carousel by MetaSlider WordPress plugin 3.29.0 does not sanitise and escape a parameter before outputting it back in the page, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting which could be used against high privilege users such as admin
